caption.p: Significantly changed bacteria genera ( a) and species ( b) by Hermetia illucens larvae treatments. The values were expressed as the medians ( n = 8). Asterisks indicated statistical differences between different group (Kruskal-Wallis test): *FDR-adjusted P-value < 0.05; ** FDR-adjusted P-value < 0.01. OTU, operational taxonomic unit
